title: The Most
creator_credit: Gordon Sheppard, Richard Ballentine and Inter Video
brief_description: A study of Hugh Hefner, creator of the fantastically successful Playboy magazine and the Bunny Clubs. He is shown with his staff in his office, at a party in his own home, talking about his ideas and beliefs, and working alone at night in the deserted office building. Music by Dudley Moore. “The Playboy Twist” sung by Tommy Danton.
